{{Wired embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD hEX |revision=S (RB760iGS) |asin= |price=69 |est_release_date=05/16/2018 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=new |type=router |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SFP, MicroSD Card slot, |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=SFP, PoE, MicroSD Card slot |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 4; |tp_firmware=<!--LEDE Project, Padavan (unofficially)--> |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui_eth=6C:3B:6B }} {{TagLine|Gigabit Ethernet Router}} :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hex_s Product Page] {{â€¢}} [https://i.mt.lv/routerboard/files/hEX_S-180516115127.pdf Datasheet]
<!-- "48RGEM04.0GALPC", "MikroTik hEX S" and "1805" is silkscreened on the board. --> *[http://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/MikroTik_News News on '''MikroTik''' Wiki] {{see also|MikroTik|MediaTek}}
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX S (RB760iGS)]] - ''Gigabit Ethernet Router'' :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hex_s RB760iGS] ('''hEX S''') - 5x GbE ports, USB 2.0, MicroSD, SFP, PoE, :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621A|MT7621A]] @880MHz Dual Core, 16MB/256MB :1x USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, Flash (SPI), RAM Nanya (DDR3) <!--:OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=6C:3B:6B 6C:3B:6B], "48RGEM02.0GALPC", "1633" ([[WNC]])-->
===Forum threads=== * [https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=134353 ''MikroTik RouterBOARD RB760iGS'' on '''MikroTik''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61633:4491#4491 ''MikroTik RouterBOARD RB760iGS'' on '''iXBT''' forums] <!-- ===Reviews=== *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-obnovlennogo-Mikrotik-hEX-RB750Gr3:-luchshiy-marshrutizator-po-sootnosheniyu-cena-kachestvo Review on '''LanMarket'''] *[http://weblance.com.ua/280-obzor-marshrutizatora-mikrotik-hex-rev3-rb750gr3-apparatnyy-ipsec-moschnyy-dvuyadernyy-processor-256-mb-operativki-i-podderzhka-dude-server.html Review on '''WebLance'''] --> ===See also=== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX v3 (RB750Gr3)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/RB750Gr3 Product page] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RB750Gr3 RB750Gr3] ('''hEX v3''') - 5x GbE ports, RouterOS L4 (6.36.1) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621A|MT7621A]] @880MHz Dual Core, 16/256MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M11 (RBM11G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/m11g Product page] :Powerful small size OEM board with one GbE LAN and one miniPCIe slot :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), 3G/LTE modem supports :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 1x GbE LAN, 1x PCIe, 1x Mini SIM Card slot *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M33 (RBM33G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/rbm33g Product page] :Powerful OEM board with three GbE LAN and two miniPCIe slots :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), USB 3.0, M.2 (Key M) :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 3x GbE LAN, 2x PCIe, 2x Mini SIM Card slot
==Images== *[https://img.routerboard.com/mimg/1539_hi_res.png Top]
